---@class BattleLog
BattleLog  = {}

function BattleLog.log(...)
    if not GameStatic_Battle.BattleLog then
        return
    end
    Logger.Log(...)
end

function BattleLog.error(...)
    if not GameStatic_Battle.BattleLog then
        return
    end
    Logger.Error(...)
end

function BattleLog.warning(...)
    if not GameStatic_Battle.BattleLog then
        return
    end
    Logger.Warning(...)
end

function BattleLog.errorTable(...)
    if not GameStatic_Battle.BattleLog then
        return
    end
    Logger.ErrorTable(...)
end
